Description:
1059sqm Block In Timbertop
Are you looking to build your dream home but can’t find a block of land big enough? Then look no further than this! In Officer’s most sought after estate you will find this magnificent corner allotment ready for you to build. Boasting 1059sqm of relatively flat land, choose your builder and start building for a better future. With Timbertop a community unto itself with ongoing events throughout the year and located centrally to shops, schools, café’s public transport and the freeway don’t hesitate in securing this block today.

Description:
Residential Subdivisional Land
Prime Position - development underway on three sides!
-One of the last opportunities to secure a small holding in this sought after location.
-Within the approved Officer PSP
-Zoned Urban Growth Residential “A”
-No GAIC
-4 bedroom brick veneer home could provide a modest income or residence in the short term.
This site benefits from surrounding developments with services soon to be installed nearby. Adjacent to Heritage Rise and Timbertop Estates where quality homes have been constructed this will be part of the master planned community with walking cycling trails, public transport routes, schools and a commercial centre a stones throw away. Adjacent to Beaconsfield & Berwick and just minutes to the M1 freeway this is definitely in the centre of the action.
Expression of Interests closing 1pm Thursday 25th October 2018.

Description:
Neat and Modern Home in Timbertop!
This ultra modern and stylish home is fantastically situated across from parklands in the Timbertop Estate, and is sure to tick all the boxes for both first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike. Offering a great floor plan that allows for easy living, the home consists of three spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms, a double lock up garage, open plan dining, kitchen and living.
This home will stand out from the rest with the towering pitched roofs, creating a feeling of spaciousness and comfortability. This is perfectly accompanied by high quality fixtures and fittings throughout, with the kitchen featuring stone bench tops, and top-end stainless steel appliances. The house also includes ducted heating, and ceiling fans throughout. Not only this, the low maintenance outdoor area is under roofline and features minimal grassed area – establishing fantastic indoor outdoor living.
Furthermore, you are located in one of the most sought after locations in the area – the Timbertop Estate. Being walking distance to the popular Timber Mill Café, within close proximity to the Beaconsfield shops, freeway access, public transport and great schools. Tenanted until February 2019 – contact Jack on 0468 958 463 for further information!

Description:
OVERLOOKING THE PARK!
If you've been looking for a block of land to make yours in Officer, you are in for an absolute treat! A lovely 452m2 allotment directly overlooks two acres of parkland within The Rise Estate. This means more room for the kids and pets to play, all within eyesight of your front door! You'll also find extra parking spaces out the front, with plenty of room for when family and friends come to visit. Sitting on the elevated side of the road with an ideal north facing aspect in the backyard for optimum warmth and sun all year around. Offering a 14m frontage and 32.27m depth, no easements and minimal fall, this block is a fantastic option to build your home on. To secure this block for yourself, please call Samantha on 0478 178 618.

Description:
Titled land in Officer!! 41 VERDANT AVENUE, OFFICER
This titled block offering 14 meters frontage perfect and ready to build a home to fit the entire family or offers great investment potential.
- 14 metres frontage & 31.5 metres depth.
- 700metres Walking distance to Cardinia Road Station along the train track on council foot path.
- Less than 5 minutes’ drive to Train Station, John Henry primary school, Arena Shopping Centre, Bridge wood Primary school, Officer Secondary college, Princes highway & Monash Freeway.
With shortage of quality blocks in today's market, this rare opportunity won't last long.

Description:
BRAND NEW METRICON BEAUTY
ITS OFFICIAL - Officer is the no 1 hotspot for new home sales in Victoria.
Be the first resident of this BRAND NEW home with 4 bedrooms and 2 separate living areas.
This home has been built with luxury in mind, including a deluxe modern kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and walk-in pantry.
The master bedroom includes full ensuite and walk-in robe. Bedrooms two, three and four include BIR’s and are serviced by a large bathroom which includes separate bath and shower, stone vanity tops and stunning fixtures and fittings.The main living/dining area has sliding door access to the alfresco and professionally landscaped gardens setting the perfect atmosphere for indoor/outdoor living.
Added features include but not limited to remote control double garage, ducted heating, alarm system, blinds, high ceilings, double glazed windows and large laundry!
This modern home is a polished package that includes all the upgrades you’d wish for in other homes. SAVE YOURSELF THE HASSLE OF BUILDING AND MOVE STRAIGHT INTO A COMPLETED BRAND NEW HOME!
Nestled in a most sought after Savannah estate location. Close to parklands, top Primary and Secondary schools and Beaconsfield shopping centre. This home will not disappoint!
This property will suit first home buyers, second home buyers, investors and down sizers.
For enquires of this exceptional property always contact Liza Hickey on
0481 185 038 or see us at our open for inspections.

Description:
BRAND-NEW, MOVE STRAIGHT IN
First impressions will leave you wanting more, with a modern façade drawing you in. This BRAND-NEW magnificent home offers an impressive layout and an abundance of natural light throughout.
The contemporary kitchen includes Caesarstone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, walk in pantry and plenty of cupboard storage. Overlooking the spacious living and dining area.
The master suite is equipped with full ensuite and walk in robe, remaining three bedrooms are great in size and include BIR’s which are serviced by a main bathroom, separate bath, shower and vanity.
Impressive additional extras include; double remote-control garage, ducted heating, blinds, floorboards, laundry and storage throughout.
The choice is yours when it comes to the outdoors with so much potential for you to build a pergola area or to keep the yard as it is, offering plenty of space for the kids and pets to enjoy situated on a 528m2 approx. block!
This modern home is the complete package, save the hassle of planning and building. The hard work has been done for you. Move straight in and make it your own.
Nestled in the Grandvue Estate, which showcases the ultimate family lifestyle with parklands throughout, St Francis Xavier College just a hop, skip and jump away and a short distance to the Arena shopping centre and a variety of take away option, M1 freeway and Cardinia train station.
What more could you ask for in a property? Be sure to inspect as this one will not last long…

Description:
I want it all
Young and modern 3 bedroom home ideally located in Potters Grove North Side Estate this property is located close proximity to Officer Town Centre, Primary, Secondary schools and the Officer train station.
- Features 3 bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe.
- Open plan family and meals.
- Ducted heating, Split system cooling.
- Large kitchen with ample bench space and stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops.
- Outdoor alfresco, low maintenance allotment.
- Double garage with remote door and internal access.
Perfect home for the young family or investor, easy access to freeway, public transport and schooling, a thriving and highly popular Estate, this one won't last long!!

A nice block of nominee land, land was purchased in April 2017.

Facing north and sitting south.
Heathfield at a glance:
* close to Timbertop Boulevard
* A wide range of block types and frontages to suit your lifestyle
* A safe community setting in an elevated, sought-after position
* Situated on the Northern Side of the Princes Hwy
* 11 Public and private schools to choose from with more on the way

Description:
Stop looking, we have the one for you
Perfectly located in the well sought after Timbertop Estate, O'Brien Real Estate is proud to present this stunning family home, with the 2.7m ceilings and large polished porcelain tiles it will be sure to impress as soon as you walk in the front door, you will leave the property saying we have found the one! Featuring;
- Four spacious bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite.
- Two separate living areas including, formal lounge room and a family meals area at the back of the home.
- Modern kitchen with mirror splash back, stainless steel appliances and a large walk in pantry.
- Large undercover outdoor alfresco, perfect for entertaining with family and friends.
Other creature comforts included in this home are, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality blinds, fixtures and fittings, double lock up garage with internal access and landscaped low maintenance gardens.
Within close proximity to Arena shopping Centre, M1 Freeway access, public transport and a range of public and private school options, you couldn't ask for much more, call O'Brien Real Estate today to find out more!

Description:
Brand new and ready for you!
Proudly presenting is this impressive JG King contemporary home situated in one of Officer’s most desirable locations. This stylish and modern townhouse is perfect for first home buyers, investors or anyone looking to downsize. It certainly will capture the eye and allow for maximum comfort with minimal maintenance.
As you step inside the entrance and down the hallway it will lead you through to the main living zone where the open plan kitchen, dining & living room awaits, embraced with natural light throughout. The modern kitchen is sure to impress the chef of the house hold, offering stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, cupboard storage and pantry. Sliding doors open out to your own low maintenance courtyard where you can relax and enjoy the sunshine in private.
The home itself features three spacious bedrooms, the master suite with ensuite and built in robe, the remaining bedrooms both offer built in robes, conveniently positioned centrally to the main bathroom and toilet.
Additional extras include; split system heating and cooling, floating floorboards, electric heating in the bedrooms and a double remote garage with the laundry located inside.
If low maintenance living is what you’re looking for, then look no further. Primely positioned in the Arcadia estate close to a variety of schools, shops, parklands and only minutes from the M1 freeway access.
*Body Corp fee applies*

Description:
A Lifestyle of Convenience & Style
Situated in the convenient estate of Arcadia is this alluring four-bedroom home. Within such close proximity to public transport, local shops, an array of amazing primary and public schools, the popular Officer club restaurant and the walking tracks there is so much to love about this home before you've even stepped foot in the door.
The generously sized master bedroom features its own large Walk-In Robe and Ensuite with a tiled shower base and double basins with modern, quality fixtures and water efficient shower heads. The remaining 3 bedrooms each have their own double Built-In Robes and are all fully carpeted.
The MasterChef of the family will not be disappointed with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, fan forced oven and 4 burner gas cooktop, along with quality benchtops with more than enough space to cook for all of the family and friends. Adjacent to the kitchen is a large family/meals area, where you can enjoy quality family time together watching a movie or playing games.
Complimenting this seamless floorplan and beautiful home is the perfect sized yard great for those who love to entertain or simply enjoy the outdoors on a nice summer night. The rest of this fantastic home features gas ducted heating for warmth in the colder months, a newly installed split system in the main living area and LED Downlights in the hallways, kitchen and living areas to help reduce your cost of living.
This property is currently leased at $1673 per calendar month making this a great investment opportunity for any investor looking to add to their portfolio as we have exceptional tenants however they are on a month to month basis so also option for you to move right in making for an easy decision to settle into 50 Viridian Avenue.
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Tickled Pink
You might think from the front that this home is similar to other homes you have seen, as soon as you walk into the home you will quickly realise that this is not the case! Stepping into the entrance, you are greeted with soaring 12ft ceilings and feature cluster lights, a breath taking entry you will never get tired of, the striking ceiling height is featured through most of the home, the master bedroom which is located at the front of the home is light filled and displays electric blinds and plantation shutters, a fitted walk in robe and stunning double vanity ensuite with stone benchtops, the well laid out floorplan leads you to the dedicated theatre room where the family can spend countless hours together, you will also find a built in bar area here for times you are entertaining. To the rear of the home the open plan kitchen and living area will take your breath away, you will love cooking in the sleek and modern kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry, tinted window splash back and stone benchtops whilst overlooking the family room and out to the undercover entertaining area designed for all year round entertaining with ceiling fan, electric heaters and cafe blinds. Leading off the living area you will find the further three bedrooms which all have built in robes and share a neat modern central bathroom with stone benches and floor to ceiling tiles. With all the features you could possibly want including ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, double remote garage with internal access, CCTV entry and all wrapped up in one of Officer’s most excitable Estates. This is a home that has the wow factor and won’t last long so be quick as you may miss out.

Description:
10 UNIT DEVELOPMENT SITE
Ten unit development site with plans and permits approved for 8 double storey townhouses. Plans drawn up for the back 2 units and awaiting approval from the council due to development occurring at the rear.
- Engineered plans available
- Superbly located in the sought-after North side of the Highway, surrounded by 4 schools within walking distance and minutes to the established townships of Berwick and Beaconsfield.
- Minutes to shopping centre, Officer Railway Station, Universities and Casey Hospital.
- Walking distance to future Officer Activity Centre.
- Easy access to Monash Freeway – Melbourne CBD (50 minutes)
- The suburb of Officer has had an annual growth rate of 21.3%, with further growth to be had due to continual surrounding development

Description:
Potters Northside. The Perfect Location For All..
Situated in the wonderful ‘Potters Northside’ estate in Officer, is this near brand new home in the perfect location. An excellent property for first home buyers, investors and down sizers. Offering you:
* Three bedrooms with the master bedroom complete with HUGE walk in robe and large sized ensuite. Remaining bedrooms with fitted robes plus share the further bathroom.
* The open plan living zone is positioned at the far end of the home and includes a stunning open kitchen with plenty of bench & cupboard space, s/s appliances plus dishwasher.
* From the living/ dining area, there is a door leading outside, where you will find a very low maintenance rear yard.
Complimented further by ducted heating, split system air conditioner, remote garage with internal access and much more.
Located in such a fantastic position, in a growing area of Officer, there are plenty of great schools, shopping, and parks close by for all of your needs plus within a short walk to the local winery.
This homebuyer's property is approximately only one year old, so the lucky buyers will have all the joys of a freshly finished home, without the stress of the extensive building process.
Insights: 6 Eloise Circuit, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT - OPEN CANCELLED
This brand new home is perfect for the owner occupier or the astute investor. Situated in a fantastic location close to shops and public transport is this 2 bedroom unit. Both of the bedrooms feature built in robes with access from the main bedroom out to the courtyard and are both serviced by a centrally located bathroom. Open plan living and dining area with split system air con, timber laminate flooring and a kitchen that features electric oven, gas hotplates, dishwasher and stone bench tops. A sliding door leads out to a paved entertaining area with access to the oversized single garage which has built in storage and remote access. Priced for immediate sale.
